snippet.title: The Technomancer
snippet.description:
Company Spider Studios and Focus Home Interactive has officially unveiled its new role-playing game called The Technomancer. In January, the creators and Bound by Flame Of Orcs and Men published a few photos on Twitter with a hint of preparing a new draft, but only now the developers have decided to reveal details of his game.
The game is set on Mars during the War of the water. Tehnomanseram to find answers to many questions about their future and the past. The players have to hide from the secret police, and the fight against the cruel realities of life on the red planet. The game is also a list of charismatic companions and crafting system cybernetically modified to improve the magical weapons.
The Technomancer release is scheduled for 2016. The game will appear on the platforms of PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.
